name: personal_sign
summary: Presents a plain text signature challenge to the user.
description: Presents a plain text signature challenge to the user and returns the signed response.

params.name: Challenge
params.description: A hex-encoded UTF-8 string to present to the user. For example, `0x${Buffer.from(exampleMessage, 'utf8').toString('hex')}`

params.name: Address
params.description: The address of the requested signing account.
